item.description:
Ipswich River is Audubon's largest sanctuary offering more than 10 miles of trails inviting you to explore the forests, meadows and wetlands. Climb the drumlin and asker, landscape features created by a glacier 15,000 years ago. Huge rocks and exotic trees provide anadvanturous walk along the Rockery Trail.

We'll meet in the parking lot. If anyone wants to carpool just indicate that in your rsvp.

After the walk we can go to a local restaurant for lunch.

group.name: The Chestnut Hill Walking Meetup Group

item.name: CHESTNUT HILL WALKING MEETUP-IPSWICH RIVER WILDLIFE SANCTUARY
